items.name: Wheat Seeds
items.description: Some seeds that can be planted to grow into wheat.

items.name: Glass Slab
items.description: A slab of glass. Can be produced by melting glass in a furnace. Can be used to construct many things.

items.name: Wooden Hoe
items.description: A primitive hoe that can be used to till land and prepare it for planting.

items.name: Basic Bin
items.description: A wooden bin that can be used to store a few items.

items.name: Cast Iron Ingot
items.description: An ingot of cast iron, that is much harder, and has a much higher melting point than iron. Made by processing steel metal with coal.

items.name: Steel Ingot
items.description: An ingot of steel metal, that is harder, and has a higher melting point than iron. Made by processing iron metal with coal.

items.name: Basic Conveyor
items.description: A basic conveyor that can be used to move items slowly.

items.name: Bone
items.description: A bone taken from the corpse of an animal. Has many uses.

items.name: Raw Beef
items.description: A juicy piece of steak, that can be cooked to become a very nutricious meal.

items.name: Raw Pork
items.description: A juicy piece of pork, that can be cooked to become a very nutricious meal.

items.name: Raw Mutton
items.description: A juicy piece of mutton, that can be cooked to become a very nutricious meal.

items.name: Cooked Beef
items.description: A juicy piece of steak. Cooked to perfection.

items.name: Cooked Pork
items.description: A juicy piece of pork. Cooked to perfection.

items.name: Cooked Mutton
items.description: A juicy piece of mutton. Cooked to perfection.

items.name: Charcoal
items.description: A piece of wood that has been heated to remove impurities. Serves as an excelent fuel.

items.name: Dirt
items.description: A common resource. Can be used in agriculture or be further processed to be used as construction meterial.

items.name: Stone
items.description: JuSt A nOrMa1 r0cK

items.name: Stick
items.description: Can be found in trees or produced from Logs. Has many uses.

items.name: Sand
items.description: Can be gathered from beaches, near lakes. Can be molten to produce glass.

items.name: Wooden Sword
items.description: Wooden Sword

items.name: Wooden Shovel
items.description: Wooden Shovel

items.name: Wooden Pickaxe
items.description: Wooden Pickaxe

items.name: Wooden Axe
items.description: Wooden Axe

items.name: Berry
items.description: A fruit commonly found in forests. Mmm, very tasty...

items.name: Anthracite Coal Chunk
items.description: A chunk of high-grade (85-95%) coal ore. Is the hardest coal ore, and the one with the greatest heat content.

items.name: Malachite Ore Chunk
items.description: A piece of copper rich ore. Can be mined from Malachite Ore. Can be molten to produce copper metal.

items.name: Azurite Ore Chunk
items.description: A piece of copper rich ore. Can be mined from Azurite Ore. Can be molten to produce copper metal, or cut to form decorative gems.

items.name: Hematite Ore Chunk
items.description: A piece of iron rich ore. Can be mined from Hematite Ore. Can be molten to produce iron metal.

items.name: Magnetite Ore Chunk
items.description: A piece of iron rich ore. Can be mined from Magnetite Ore. Can be molten to produce iron metal.

items.name: Lodestone
items.description: A naturally magnetized piece of Magnetite Ore, is rarely obtained by mining Magnetite Ore, alongside Magnetite Ore Chunks. Can be used as a primitive magnet, or molten to produce metal.

items.name: Sapling
items.description: A sapling that was found near a tree that was cut down. Plant it again, so that it may grow to become a tree. May be occasionally found when cutting trees.

items.name: Fence
items.description: A fence created from wood. May be placed to block the path of players or other entities.

items.name: Torch
items.description: A torch created from wood. Can be used to provide light at nighttime.

items.name: Brick Wall
items.description: A wall created from fired clay bricks.

items.name: Stone Brick Wall
items.description: A wall created from stone bricks put together.

items.name: Burner Furnace Mk1
items.description: A furnace that can be used to melt ore.

items.name: Log
items.description: A wooden log taken from a cut tree. Has many uses.

items.name: Flask
items.description: A metal flask that can store water or some other liquid. Very convenient for staying hydrated far from lakes.

items.name: Wheat
items.description: A useful crop.

items.name: Iron Ingot
items.description: A ingot of iron metal. Has many uses.

items.name: Copper Ingot
items.description: A ingot of copper metal. Has many uses.
